It unknown determinant predict insulin-induced weight gain type 2 diabetes mellitus . The aim study therefore , assess determinant insulin-induced weight gain type 2 diabetes mellitus . In retrospective cross-sectional study ( Jansen HJ et al. , submit ) two extreme subgroup identify ( subject weight gain 80th percentile ) subgroup non-weight gainer ( subject weight gain 20th percentile ) . It find gainer less energy expenditure initiation insulin therapy non-weight gainer . Therefore , primary aim study detect association energy expenditure weight gain
